headline: Nucor (NUE) Extends Dividend Streak with 212th Consecutive Quarterly Payment
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is included among the 14 Best Warren Buffett Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 20, Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE)’s Board of Directors approved its regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.56 per share, which will be paid on May 11, 2026, to shareholders who are on record as of March 31, 2026. This marks the […]
